content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position (47.5, -81.5) collecting iron plates from the furnace
Use-case: Processes iron ore into iron plates with an integrated collection point (wooden chest) for direct resource storage and management.

ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to insufficient production output and delayed processing
- Verify that the processing cycle receives adequate time to complete so that enough outputs are available.
- Adjust timing or processing cycles to better match extraction requirements.

### Errors when inserting or extracting items despite resource unavailability
- Confirm that the inventory or target structure contains the intended resource prior to action.
- Double-check inventory levels and entity contents to prevent actions on empty entities.
- When extracting from a collection point (wooden chest or furnace), ensure that the entity holds the required resource before extraction.
- Consider re-checking the entity’s inventory after expected processing to avoid extraction attempts on empty or outdated entities.
